Html:
Hey,
Perhaps this bug is just locally - running in debug with the dev server. But if not then it could be a bug.
I have 2 area's configured in the system - one of them being "Articles"

So I can view a list of posts at:
http://localhost:30913/Articles

But the rss feed:
http://localhost:30913/Articles/rss
only works in internet explorer and not in firefox.

In firefox i get an xml doc, with info at the top stating: This XML file does not appear to have any style information associated with it. The document tree is shown below...

Of course the visitmix website works in both e.g.:
http://visitmix.com/Articles/rss

Cathal.

That might just be in dev, but I can't think of a reason why dev would be any different than prod.  You can paste in the XML in here and I can take a look, but there are many reasons this might happen.  Two I can think of offhand are:

  1. Is there a carriage return at the beginnin of the file?  There shouldn't be and it can cause problems.
  2. Are there any items for the feed to render.  I know we have a bug currently where if there are no comments yet, the comment feed doesn't render.
